name: Kachlian
movement: fly 40 ft., hover, no ground movement
description: The Kachlian is a huge, formidable aberration with a distinctive presence, featuring three long tentacles for grappling its foes. Its body exudes an aura of dark power, underlining its neutral evil nature.
memorable: The Kachlian embodies the ability to consume souls, preventing resurrection and adding a sense of urgency to encounters.
goals: To dominate and manipulate its surroundings, often consuming the souls of its victims.
relations: Often encountered alone, it may serve as a master of lesser aberrations or be found in the company of dark sorcerers.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded places, such as ancient ruins or underground lairs.
strengths: High Constitution and solid Armor Class grant it durability, while flight allows it to avoid ground-based threats.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity limits its agility, and it cannot move across the ground.
attacks: Multiattack with tentacles, dealing significant bludgeoning damage and grappling targets.
most_powerful_ability: Consume Soul prevents resurrection of slain foes for 24 hours unless the Kachlian is defeated.
senses: Darkvision extends to 120 feet, allowing it to see in darkness as if it were bright light.
additional_information: Immune to stunned, paralyzed, and prone conditions.
Can cast spells as a 7th-level wizard with a variety of effects.
Tentacles can grapple targets of Large size or smaller.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells, including crowd control and offensive spells like confusion and magic missile.
test_queries: creature immune to paralysis and stun
